juzs.text: kis cheez ke vishay mein ve aapas mein poochh-gachchh kar rahe hai
us badee khabar ke sambandh mein
jisamen ve matabhed rakhate hai
kadaapi nahin, sheeghr hee ve jaan lenge.
phir kadaapi nahin, sheeghr hee ve jaan lenge.
kya aisa nahin hai ki hamane dharatee ko bichhauna banaaya
aur pahaadon ko mekhe
aur hamane tumhen jod-jode paida kiya
aur tumhaaree neend ko thakan door karanevaalee banaaya
raat ko aavaran banaaya
aur din ko jeevan-vrti ke lie banaaya
aur tumhaare oopar saat sudrdh aakaash nirmit kie
aur ek tapt aur prakaashamaan pradeep banaaya
aur baras padanevaalee ghataon se hamane moosalaadhaar paanee utaara
taaki ham usake dvaara anaaj aur vanaspati utpaadit karen
aur saghan baang bhee.
nissandeh faisale ka din ek niyat samay hai
jis din narasingha mein phoonk maaree jaegee, to tum giroh ko giroh chale aaoge.
aur aakaash khol diya jaega to dvaar hee dvaar ho jaenge
aur pahaad chalae jaenge, to ve bilkul mareechika hokar rah jaenge
vaastav mein jahannam ek ghaat-sthal hai
sarakashon ka thikaana hai
vastusthiti yah hai ki ve usamen muddat par muddat bitaate rahenge
ve usame na kisee sheetalata ka maza chakhege aur na kisee pey ka
sivaay khaulate paanee aur bahatee peep-rakt ke
yah badale ke roop mein unake karmon ke theek anukool hoga
vaastav mein kisee hisaab kee aasha na rakhate the
aur unhonne hamaaree aayaton ko khoob jhuthalaaya
aur hamane har cheez likhakar gin rakhee hai
ab chakho maza ki yaatana ke atirikt ham tumhaare lie kisee aur cheez mein badhottaree nahin karenge.
nissadeh dar rakhanevaalon ke lie ek badee saphalata hai
baag hai aur angoor
aur navayauvana samaan umravaalee
aur chhalaqata jaam
ve usamen na to koee vyarth baat sunenge aur na koee jhuthalaane kee baat
yah tumhaare rab kee or se badala hoga, hisaab ke anusaar pradatt
vah aakaashon aur dharatee ka aur jo kuchh unake beech hai sabaka rab hai, atyant krpaasheel hai, usake saamane baat karana unake bas mein nahin hoga
jis din rooh aur farishte paktibaddh khade honge, ve bolenge nahin, sivaay us vyakti ke jise rahamaan anumati de aur jo theek baat kahe
vah din saty hai. ab jo koee chaahe apane rab kee or ruj kare
hamane tumhen nikat aa lagee yaatana se saavadhaan kar diya hai. jis din manushy dekh lega jo kuchh usake haathon ne aage bheja, aur inakaar karanevaala kahega, "ai kaash! ki main mittee hota
gavaah hai ve (havaen) jo zor se ukhaad phainke
aur gavaah hai ve (havaen) jo narmee ke saath chalen
aur gavaah hai ve jo vaayumandal mein tairen
phir ek-doosare se agrasar hon
aur maamale kee tadabeer karen
jis din hila daalegee hila daalanevaale ghatana
usake peechh ghatit hogee doosaree (ghatana)
kitane hee dil us din kaanp rahe honge
unakee nigaahen jhukee hongee
ve kahate hai, "kya vaastav mein ham pahalee haalat mein phir lautae jaenge
kya jab ham khokhalee galit haddiyaan ho chuke honge
ve kahate hai, "tab to lautana bade hee ghaate ka hoga.
vah to bas ek hee jhidakee hogee
phir kya dekhenge ki ve ek samatal maidaan mein upasthit hai
kya tumhen moosa kee khabar pahunchee hai
jabaki usake rab ne pavitr ghaatee tuva mein use pukaara tha
ki "firaun ke paas jao, usane bahut sir utha rakha hai
aur kaho, kya too yah chaahata hai ki svayan ko paak-saaf kar le
aur main tere rab kee or tera maargadarshan karoon ki tu (usase) dare
phir usane (moosa ne) usako badee nishaanee dikhaee
kintu usane jhuthala diya aur kaha na maana
phir sakriyata dikhaate hue palata
phir (logon ko) ekatr kiya aur pukaarakar kaha
main tumhaara uchchakoti ka svaamee hoon
antatah allaah ne use aakhirat aur duniya kee shikshaaprad yaatana mein pakad liya
nissandeh isamen us vyakti ke lie badee shiksha hai jo dare
kya tumhen paida karana adhik kathin kaary hai ya aakaash ko? allaah ne use banaaya
usakee oonchaee ko khoob ooncha karake use theek-thaak kiya
aur usakee raat ko andhakaaramay banaaya aur usaka divas-prakaash prakat kiya
aur dharatee ko dekho! isake pashchaat use phailaaya
usamen se usaka paanee aur usaka chaara nikaala
aur pahaado ko dekho! unhen us (dharatee) mein jama diya
tumhaare lie aur tumhaare maveshiyon ke lie jeevan-saamagree ke roop mein
phir jab vah mahaavipada aaegee
us din manushy jo kuchh bhee usane prayaas kiya hoga use yaad karega
aur bhadakatee aag (jahannam) dekhane vaalon ke lie khol dee jaegee
to jis kisee ne sarakashee kee
aur saansaarik jeevan ko praathamikata do hogee
to nissandeh bhadakatee aag hee usaka thikaana hai
aur raha vah vyakti jisane apane rab ke saamane khade hone ka bhay rakha aur apane jee ko buree ichchha se roka
to jannat hee usaka thikaana hai
ve tumase us ghadee ke vishay mein poochhate hai ki vah kab aakar thaharegee
usake bayaan karane se tumhaara kya sambandh
usakee antim pahunch to tere se hee sambandh rakhatee hai
tum to bas us vyakti ko saavadhaan karanevaale ho jo usase dare
jis din ve use dekhenge to (aisa lagega) maano ve (duniya mein) bas ek shaam ya usakee subah hee thahare hai
usane tyoree chadhaee aur munh pher liya
is kaaran ki usake paas andha aa gaya.
aur tujhe kya maaloom shaayad vah svayan ko sanvaarata-nikhaarata ho
ya naseehat haasil karata ho to naseehat usake lie laabhadaayak ho
raha vah vyakti jo dhanee ho gaya ha
too usake peechhe pada hai
haalaanki vah apane ko na nikhaare to tujhapar koee zimmedaaree nahin aatee
aur raha vah vyakti jo svayan hee tere paas daudata hua aaya
aur vah darata bhee hai
to too usase beparavaee karata hai
kadaapi nahin, ve (aayaten) to mahatvapoorn naseehat hai
to jo chaahe use yaad kar le
pavitr pannon mein ankit hai
pratishthiîta, uchch
aise kaatibon ke haathon mein raha karate hai
jo pratishthit aur nek hai
vinasht hua manushy! kaisa akrtagy hai
usako kis cheez se paida kiya
tanik-see boond se usako paida kiya, to usake lie ek andaaja thaharaaya
phir maarg ko dekho, use sugam kar diya
phir use mrtyu dee aur krab mein use rakhavaaya
phir jab chaahega use (jeevit karake) utha khada karega.
kadaapi nahin, usane usako poora nahin kiya jisaka aadesh allaah ne use diya hai
atah manushy ko chaahie ki apane bhojan ko dekhe
ki hamane khoob paanee barasaaya
phir dharatee ko vishesh roop se phaada
phir hamane usamen ugae anaaj
aur angoor aur tarakaaree
aur zaitoon aur khajoor
aur ghane baag
aur meve aur ghaas-chaara
tumhaare lie aur tumhaare chaupaayon ke liee jeevan-saamagree ke roop mein
phir jab vah bahara kar denevaalee prachand aavaaz aaegee
jis din aadamee bhaagega apane bhaee se
aur apanee maan aur apane baap se
aur apanee patnee aur apane beton se
unamen se pratyek vyakti ko us din aisee padee hogee jo use doosaron se beparavaah kar degee
kitane hee chehare us din raushan honge
hansate, praphullit
aur kitane hee chehare honge jinapar us din dhool padee hogee
unapar kalauns chha rahee hogee
vaheen honge inakaar karanevaale duraachaaree log
jab soory lapet diya jaega
saare taare maile ho jaenge
jab pahaad chalae jaenge
jab das maas kee gaabhin oontaniyaan aazaad chhod dee jaengee
jab jangalee jaanavar ekatr kie jaenge
jab samudr bhadaka diya jaenge
jab log qism-qism kar die jaenge
aur jab jeevit gaadee gaee ladakee se poochha jaega
ki usakee hatya kis gunaah ke kaaran kee gaee
aur jab karm-patr phaila die jaenge
aur jab aakaash kee khaal utaar dee jaegee
jab jahannam ko dahakaaya jaega
aur jab jannat nikat kar dee jaegee
to koee bhee kyakti jaan lega ki usane kya upasthit kiya hai
atah nahin! main qasam khaata hoon peechhe hatanevaalon kee
chalanevaalon, chhipane-dubakane-vaalon kee
saakshee hai raatri jab vah prasthaan kare
aur saakshee hai praatah jab vah saans le
nishchay hee vah ek aadaraneey sandeshavaahak kee laee huee vaanee hai
jo shaktivaala hai, sinhaasanavaale ke yahaan jisakee paith hai
usaka aadesh maana jaata hai, vahaan vah vishvaasapaatr hai
tumhaara saathee koee deevaana nahin
usane to (paraakaashthaan ke) pratyaksh kshitij par hokar us (farishte) ko dekha hai
aur vah paroksh ke maamale mein krpan nahin hai
aur vah (quraan) kisee dhutakaare hue shaitaan kee laee huee vaanee nahin hai
phir tum kidhar ja rahe ho
vah to saare sansaar ke lie bas ek anusmrti hai
usake lie to tumame se seedhe maarg par chalana chaahe
aur tum nahin chaah sakate sivaay isake ki saare jahaan ka rab allaah chaahe
jabaki aakaash phat jaega
aur jabaki taare bikhar jaenge
aur jabaki samudr bah padenge
aur jabaki qaben ukhed dee jaengee
tab har vyakti jaan lega jise usane praathamikata dee aur peechhe daala
ai manushy! kis cheez ne tujhe apane udaar prabhu ke vishay mein dhokhe mein daal rakha hain
jisane tera praaroop banaaya, phir nakh-shikh se tujhe durust kiya aur tujhe santulan pradaan kiya
jis roop mein chaaha usane tujhe jodakar taiyaar kiya
kuchh nahin, balki tum badala die jaane ka jhuthalaate ho
jabaki tumapar nigaraanee karanevaale niyukt hain
pratishthit lipik
ve jaan rahe hote hai jo kuchh bhee tum log karate ho
nissandeh vafaadaar log nematon mein honge
aur nishchay hee duraachaaree bhadakatee huee aag mein
jisamen ve badale ke din pravesh karenge
aur usase ve ojhal nahin honge
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki badale ka din kya hai
phir tumhen kya maaloom ki badale ka din kya hai
jis din koee vyakti kisee vyakti ke lie kisee cheez ka adhikaaree na hoga, maamala us din allaah hee ke haath mein hoga
tabaahee hai ghataanevaalon ke lie
jo naapakar logon par nazar jamae hue lete hain to poora-poora lete hain
kintu jab unhen naapakar ya taulakar dete hain to ghataakar dete hain
kya ve samajhate nahin ki unhen (jeevit hokar) uthana hai
ek bhaaree din ke lie
jis din log saare sansaar ke rab ke saamane khade honge
kuchh nahin, nishchay hee duraachaariyon ka kaagaj sijjeen mein hai
tumhen kya maaloom ki sijjeen kya hain
muhar laga hua kaagaj
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaane-vaalon kee
jo badale ke din ko jhuthalaate hai
aur use to bas pratyek vah kyakti hee jhoothalaata hai jo seema ka ullanghan karanevaala, paapee hai
jab hamaaree aayaten use sunaee jaatee hai to kahata hai, "ye to pahale kee kahaaniyaan hai.
kuchh nahin, balki jo kuchh ve kamaate rahe hai vah unake dilon par chadh gaya hai
kuchh nahin, avashy hee ve us din apane rab se ot mein honge
phir ve bhadakatee aag mein ja padege
phir kaha jaega, "yah vahee hai jis tum jhuthalaate the
kuchh nahee, nissandeh vafaadaar logon ka kaagaz illeeyeen (uchch shrenee ke logon) mein hai.
aur tum kya jaano ki illeeyeen kya hai
likha hua rajistar
jise dekhane ke lie saameepy praapt log upasthit honge
nissandeh achchhe log nematon mein honge
oonchee masanadon par se dekh rahe honge
unake chaharon se tumhen nematon kee taazagee aur aabha ko bodh ho raha hoga
unhen muharaband vishuddh pey pilaaya jaega
muhar usakee mushk hee hogee - jo log doosaree par baazee le jaana chaahate ho ve is cheez ko praapt karane mein baazee le jaane ka prayaas kare
aur usamen tasaneem ka mishran hoga
haal yah hai ki vah ek srot hai, jisapar baithakar saameepy praapt log pienge
jo aparaadhee hai ve eemaan laanevaalon par hansate the
aur jab unake paas se guzarate to aapas mein aankhon aur bhaunhon se ishaare karate the
aur jab apane logon kee or palatate hai to chahakate, itaraate hue palatate the
aur jab unhen dekhate to kahate, "ye to bhatake hue hai.
haalaanki ve unapar koee nigaraanee karanevaale banaakar nahin bheje gae the
to aaj eemaan laanevaale, inakaar karanevaalon par hans rahe hain
oonchee masanadon par se dekh rahe hai
kya mil gaya badala inakaar karanevaalon ko usaka jo kuchh ve karate rahe hai
jabaki aakaash phat jaega
aur vah apane rab kee sunega, aur use yahee chaahie bhee
jab dharatee phaila dee jaegee
aur jo kuchh usake bheetar hai use baahar daalakar khaalee ho jaegee
aur vah apane rab kee sunegee, aur use yahee chaahie bhee
ai manushy! too mashaqqat karata hua apane rab hee kee or khincha chala ja raha hai aur antatah usase milane vaala hai
phir jis kisee ko usaka karm-patr usake daahine haath mein diya gaya
to usase aasaan, sarasaree hisaab liya jaega
aur vah apane logon kee or khush-khush palatega
aur rah vah vyakti jisaka karm-patr (usake baen haath mein) usakee peeth ke peechhe se diya gaya
to vah vinaash (mrtyu) ko pukaarega
aur dahakatee aag mein ja padega
vah apane logon mein magn tha
usane yah samajh rakha tha ki use kabhee palatana nahin hai
kyon nahin, nishchay hee usaka rab to use dekh raha tha
atah kuchh nahin, main qasam khaata hoon saandhy-laalima kee
aur raat kee aur usake samet lene kee
aur chandrama kee jabaki vah poorn ho jaata hai
nishchay hee tumhen manjil par manjil chadhana hai
phir unhen kya ho gaya hai ki eemaan nahin laate
aur jab unhen kuraan padhakar sunaaya jaata hai to sajade mein nahin gir padate
nahin, balki inakaar karanevaale to jhuthalaate hai
haalaanki jo kuchh ve apane andar ekatr kar rahe hai, allaah use bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
atah unhen dukhad yaatana kee mangal soochana de do
alabatta jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie unake lie kabhee na samaapt. honevaala pratidaan hai
saakshee hai burjonvaala aakaash
aur vah din jisaka vaada kiya gaya hai
aur dekhanevaala, aur jo dekha gaya
vinasht hon khaeevaale
eedhan bharee aagavaale
jabaki ve vahaan baithe honge
aur ve jo kuchh eemaanavaalon ke saath karate rahe, use dekhenge
unhonne un (eemaanavaalon) se keval is kaaran badala liya aur shatruta kee ki ve us allaah par eemaan rakhate the jo atyant prabhutvashaalee, prashansaneey hai
jisake lie aakaashon aur dharatee kee baadashaahee hai. aur allaah har cheez ka saakshee hai

jin logon ne eemaanavaale purushon aur eemaanavaalee striyon ko sataaya aur aazamaeesh mein daala, phir tauba na kee, nishchay hee unake lie jahannam kee yaatana hai aur unake lie jalane kee yaatana hai
nishchay hee jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie unake lie baag hai, jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hogee. vahee hai badee saphalata
vaastav mein tumhaare rab kee pakad badee hee sakht hai
vahee aarambh karata hai aur vahee punaraavrtti karata hai
vah bada kshamaasheel, bahut prem karanevaala hai
sinhaasan ka svaamee hai, bada gauravashaalee
jo chaahe use kar daalanevaala
kya tumhen un senaon kee bhee khabar pahunchee hain
firaun aur samood kee
nahin, balki jin logon ne inakaar kiya hai, ve jhuthalaane mein lage hue hai
haalaanki allaah unhen ghere hue hai, unake aage-peechhe se
nahin, balki vah to gaurav quraan hai
surakshit pattika mein ankit hai
saakshee hai aakaash, aur raat mein prakat honevaala
aur tum kya jaano ki raat mein prakat honevaala kya hai
damakata hua taara
ki har ek vyakti par ek nigaraanee karanevaala niyukt hai
atah manushy ko chaahie ki dekhe ki vah kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
ek uchhalate paanee se paida kiya gaya hai
jo peeth aur pasaliyon ke madhy se nikalata hai
nishchay hee vah usake lauta dene kee saamarthy rakhata hai
jis din chhipee cheezen parakhee jaengee
to us samay usake paas na to apanee koee shakti hogee aur na koee sahaayak
saakshee hai aavartan (ulat-pher) vaala aakaash
aur phat jaanevaalee dharatee
vah do-took baat hai
vah koee hansee-mazaak nahee hai
ve ek chaal chal rahe hai
aur main bhee ek chaal chal raha hoon
at muhalat de do un inakaar karanevaalon ko; muhalat de do unhen thodee-see
tasabeeh karo, apane sarvaachch rab ke naam kee
jisane paida kiya, phir theek-thaak kiya
jisane nirdhaarit kiya, phir maarg dikhaaya
jisane vanaspati ugaee
phir use khoob ghana aur hara-bhara kar diya
ham tumhen padha denge, phir tum bhoologe nahin
baat yah hai ki allaah kee ichchha hee kriyaanvit hai. nishchay hee vah jaanata hai khule ko bhee aur use bhee jo chhipa rahe
ham tumhen sahaj dhang se us cheez kee paatr bana denge jo sahaj evan mrdul (aaraamadaayak) hai
atah naseehat karo, yadi naseehat laabhaprad ho
naseehat haasil kar lega jisako dar hoga
kintu usase kataraega vah atyant durbhaagyavaala
jo badee aag mein padega
phir vah usamen na marega na jiega
saphal ho gaya vah jisane apane aapako nikhaar liya
aur apane rab ke naam ka smaran kiya, atah namaaz ada kee
nahin, balki tum to saansaarik jeevan ko praathamikata dete ho
haalaanki aakhirat adhik uttam aur shesh rahanevaalee hai
nissandeh yahee baat pahale kee kitaabon mein bhee hai
ibaraeem aur moosa kee kitaabon mein
kya tumhen us chha jaanevaalee kee khabar pahunchee hai
us din kitane hee chehare gire hue honge
kathin parishram mein pade, thake-haare
dahakatee aag mein pravesh karenge
khaulate hue srot se pienge
unake lie koee khaana na hoga sivaay ek prakaar ke zaree ke
jo na pusht kare aur na bhookh mitae
us din kitane hee chehare praphullit aur saumy honge
apane prayaas par prasann
uchch jannat mein
jisamen koee vyarth baat na sunenge
usamen srot pravaahit hoga
usamen oonchee-oonchee masanaden hogee
pyaale dhang se rakhe honge
kram se gaav takie lage honge
aur har or qaaleene bichhee hongee
phir kya ve oont kee or nahin dekhate ki kaisa banaaya gaya
aur aakaash kee or ki kaisa ooncha kiya gaya
aur pahaado kee or ki kaise khade kie gae
aur dharatee kee or ki kaisee bichhaee gaee
achchha to naseehat karo! tum to bas ek naseehat karanevaale ho
tum unapar koee daroga nahee ho
kintu jis kisee ne munh phera aur inakaar kiya
to allaah use badee yaatana dega
nissandeh hamaaree or hee hai unaka lautana
phir hamaare hee zimme hai unaka hisaab lena
saakshee hai ushaakaal
saakshee hai das raaten
saakshee hai yugm aur ayugm
saakshee hai raat jab vah vida ho rahee ho
kya isamen buddhimaan ke lie badee gavaahee hai
kya tumane dekha nahin ki tumhaare rab ne kya kiya aad ke saath
stambhon vaale iram ke saath
ve aise the jinake sadrsh bastiyon mein paida nahin hue
aur samood ke saath, jinhonne ghaatee mein chattaane taraashee thee
aur mekhovaale firaun ke saath
ve log ki jinhonne desho mein sarakashee kee
aur unamen bahut bigaad paida kiya
atatah tumhaare rab ne unapar yaatana ka koda barasa diya
nissandeh tumhaara rab ghaat mein rahata hai
kintu manushy ka haal yah hai ki jab usaka rab is prakaar usakee pareeksha karata hai ki use pratishtha aur nemat pradaan karata hai, to vah kahata hai, "mere rab ne mujhe pratishthit kiya.
kintu jab kabhee vah usakee pareeksha is prakaar karata hai ki usakee rozee napee-tulee kar deta hai, to vah kahata hai, "mere rab ne mera apamaan kiya.
kadaapi nahin, balki tum anaath ka sammaan nahin karate
aur na muhataaj ko khilaan par ek-doosare ko ubhaarate ho
aur saaree meeraas sametakar kha jaate ho
aur dhan se utkat prem rakhate ho
kuchh nahin, jab dharatee koot-kootakar churn-vichurn kar dee jaegee
aur tumhaara rab aur farishta (bandon kee) ek-ek pankti ke paas aaega
aur jahannam ko us din laaya jaega, us din manushy chetega, kintu kahaan hai usake lie laabhaprad us samay ka chetana
vah kahega, "ai kaash! mainne apane jeevan ke lie kuchh karake aage bheja hota.
phir us din koee nahin jo usakee jaisee yaatana de
aur koee nahin jo usakee jakadaband kee tarah baandhe
ai santusht aatma
laut apane rab kee or, is tarah ki too usase raazee hai vah tujhase raazee hai. atah mere bandon mein sammilit ho ja.
atah mere bandon mein sammilit ho ja
aur pravesh kar meree jannat mein.
suno! main qasam khaata hoon is nagar (makka) kee
haal yah hai ki tum isee nagar mein rah rahe ho
aur baap aur usakee santaan kee
nissandeh hamane manushy ko poorn mashaqqat (anukoolata aur santulan) ke saath paida kiya
kya vah samajhata hai ki usapar kisee ka bas na chalega
kahata hai ki "mainne dhero maal uda diya.
kya vah samajhata hai ki kisee ne use dekha nahin
kya hamane use nahin dee do aankhen
aur ek zabaan aur do honth
aur kya aisa nahin hai ki hamane dikhaee use do oonchaiyaan
kintu vah to humakakar ghaatee mein se gujanra hee nahin aur (na usane mukti ka maarg paaya)
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki vah ghaatee kya hai
kisee garadan ka chhudaana
ya bhookh ke din khaana khilaana
kisee nikatavartee anaath ko
ya dhool-dhoosarit muhataaj ko
phir yah ki vah un logon mein se ho jo eemaan lae aur jinhonne ek-doosare ko dhairy kee taakeed kee , aur ek-doosare ko daya kee taakeed kee
vahee log hai saubhaagyashaalee
rahe ve log jinhonne hamaaree aayaaton ka inakaar kiya, ve durbhaagyashaalee log hai
unapar aag hogee, jise band kar diya gaya hoga
saakshee hai soory aur usakee prabha
aur chandrama jabaki vah unake peechhe aae
aur din, jabaki vah use prakat kar de
aur raat, jabaki vah usako dhaank le
aur aakaash aur jaisa kuchh use uthaaya
aur dharatee aur jaisa kuchh use bichhaaya
aur aatma aur jaisa kuchh use sanvaara
phir usake dil mein daalee usakee buraee aur usakee parahezagaaree
saphal ho gaya jisane use vikasit kiya
aur asaphal hua jisane use daba diya
samood ne apanee sarakashee se jhuthalaaya
jab unamen ka sabase bada durbhaagyashaalee uth khada hua
to allaah ke rasool ne unase kaha, "saavadhaan, allaah kee oontanee aur usake pilaane (kee baaree) se.
kintu unhonne use jhuthalaaya aur us oontanee kee koochen kaat daalee. antatah unake rab ne unake gunaah ke kaaran unapar tabaahee daal dee aur unhen baraabar kar diya
aur use usake parinaam ka koee bhay nahin
saakshee hai raat jabaki vah chha jae
aur din jabaki vah prakaashamaan ho
aur nar aur maada ka paida karana
ki tumhaara prayaas bhinn-bhinn hai
to jis kisee ne diya aur dar rakha
aur achchhee cheez kee pushti kee
ham us sahaj dhang se us cheej ka paatr bana denge, jo sahaj aur mrdul (sukh-saadhy) hai
raha vah vyakti jisane kanjoosee kee aur beparavaahee baratee
aur achchhee cheez ko jhuthala diya
ham use sahaj dhang se us cheez ka paatr bana denge, jo kathin cheez (kasht-saadhy) hai
aur usaka maal usake kuchh kaam na aaega, jab vah (sir ke bal) khadd mein girega
nissandeh hamaare zimme hai maarg dikhaana
aur vaastav mein hamaare adhikaar mein hai aakhirat aur duniya bhee
atah mainne tumhen dahakatee aag se saavadhaan kar diya
isamen bas vahee padega jo bada hee abhaaga hoga
jisane jhuthalaaya aur munh phera
aur usase bach jaega vah atyant parahezagaar vyakti
jo apana maal dekar apane aapako nikhaarata hai
aur haal yah hai ki kisee ka usapar upakaar nahin ki usaka badala diya ja raha ho
balki isase abheesht keval usake apane uchch rab ke mukh (prasannata) kee chaah hai
aur vah sheeghr hee raazee ho jaega
saakshee hai chadhata din
aur raat jabaki usaka sannaata chha jae
tumhaare rab ne tumhen na to vida kiya aur na vah bezaar (aprasann) hua
aur nishchay hee baad mein aanevaalee (avadhi) tumhaare lie pahalevaalee se uttam hai
aur sheeghr hee tumhaara rab tumhen pradaan karega ki tum prasann ho jaoge
kya aisa nahin ki usane tumhen anaath paaya to thikaana diya
aur tumhen maarg se aparichit paaya to maarg dikhaaya
aur tumhen nirdhan paaya to samrddh kar diya
atah jo anaath ho use mat dabaana
aur jo maangata ho use na jhijhakana
aur jo tumhen rab kee anukampa hai, use bayaan karate raho
kya aisa nahin ki hamane tumhaara seena tumhaare lie khol diya
aur tumapar se tumhaara bojh utaar diya
jo tumhaaree kamar tode daal raha tha
aur tumhaare lie tumhaare zikr ko ooncha kar diya
atah nissandeh kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai
nissandeh kathinaee ke saath aasaanee bhee hai
atah jab nivrt ho to parishram mein lag jao
aur apane rab se lau lagao
saakshee hai teen aur zaitoon
aur toor seeneen
aur yah shaantipoorn bhoomi (makka)
nissandeh hamane manushy ko sarvottam sanrachana ke saath paida kiya
phir hamane use nikrshtatam dasha kee or lauta diya, jabaki vah svayan giranevaala bana
sivaay un logon ke jo eemaan lae aur jinhonne achchhe karm kie, to unake lie kabhee na samaapt honevaala badala hai
ab isake baad kya hai, jo badale ke vishay mein tumhen jhuthalae
kya allaah sab haakimon se bada haakim nahin hain
padho, apane rab ke naam ke saath jisane paida kiya
paida kiya manushy ko jame hue khoon ke ek lothade se
padho, haal yah hai ki tumhaara rab bada hee udaar hai
jisane qalam ke dvaara shiksha dee
manushy ko vah gyaan pradaan kiya jis vah na jaanata tha
kadaapi nahin, manushy sarakashee karata hai
isalie ki vah apane aapako aatmanirbhar dekhata hai
nishchay hee tumhaare rab hee kee or palatana hai
kya tumane dekha us vyakti ko
jo ek bande ko rokata hai, jab vah namaaz ada karata hai
tumhaara kya vichaar hai? yadi vah seedhe maarg par ho
ya parahezagaaree ka hukm de (usake achchha hone mein kya sandeh hai)
tumhaara kya vichaar hai? yadi us (rokanevaale) ne jhuthalaaya aur munh moda (to usake bura hone mein kya sandeh hai)
kya usane nahin jaana ki allaah dekh raha hai
kadaapi nahin, yadi vah baaz na aaya to ham chotee pakadakar ghaseetenge
jhoothee, khataakaar chotee
ab bula le vah apanee majalis ko
ham bhee bulae lete hai sipaahiyon ko
kadaapi nahin, usakee baat na maano aur sajade karate aur qareeb hote raho
hamane ise qadr kee raat mein avatarit kiya
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki qadr kee raat kya hai
qadr kee raat uttam hai hazaar maheenon se
usamen farishten aur rooh har mahatvapoorn maamalen mein apane rab kee anumati se utarate hai
vah raat poornatah shaanti aur salaamatee hai, ushaakaal ke uday hone tak
kitaabavaalon aur musharikon (bahudevavaadiyon) mein se jin logon ne inakaar kiya ve kufr (inakaar) se alag honevaale nahin jab tak ki unake paas spasht pramaan na aa jae
allaah kee or se ek rasool pavitr prshthon ko padhata hua
jinamen thos aur theek aadesh ankit hon
haalaanki jinhen kitaab dee gaee thee. ve isake pashchaat phoot mein pade ki unake paas spasht pramaan aa chuka tha

aur unhen aadesh bhee bas yahee diya gaya tha ki ve allaah kee bandagee kare nishtha evan vinayasheelata ko usake lie vishisht karake, bilakul ekaagr hokar, aur namaaz kee paabandee karen aur zakaat de. aur yahee hai satyavaadee samudaay ka dharm

nissandeh kitaabavaalon aur musharikon (bahudevavaadiyon) mein se jin logon ne inakaar kiya hai, ve jahannam kee aag mein padege; usamen sadaiv rahane ke lie. vahee paida kie gae praaniyon mein sabase bure hai
kintu nishchay hee ve log, jo eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie paida kie gae praaniyon mein sabase achchhe hai

unaka badala unake apane rab ke paas sadaabahaar baag hai, jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hongee. unamen ve sadaiv rahenge. allaah unase raazee hua aur ve usase raazee hue. yah kuchh usake lie hai, jo apane rab se dara
jab dharatee is prakaar hila daalee jaegee jaisa use hilaaya jaana hai
aur dharatee apane bojh baahar nikaal degee
aur manushy kahega, "use kya ho gaya hai
us din vah apana vrttaant sunaegee
is kaaran ki tumhaare rab ne use yahee sanket kiya hoga
us din log alag-alag nikalenge, taaki unhen karm dikhae jaen
atah jo koee kanabhar bhee nekee karega, vah use dekh lega
aur jo koee kanabhar bhee buraee karega, vah bhee use dekh lega
saakshee hai jo haanphate-phunkaar maarate hue daudate hai
phir thokaron se chinagaariyaan nikaalate hai
phir subah savere dhaava maarate hote hai
usamen uthaaya unhonne gard-gubaar
aur isee haal mein ve dal mein ja ghuse
nissandeh manushy apane rab ka bada akrtagy hain
aur nishchay hee vah svayan isapar gavaah hai
aur nishchay hee vah dhan ke moh mein bada drdh hai
to kya vah jaanata nahin jab ugavala liya jaega to qabron mein hai
aur spasht anaavrtt kar diya jaega to kuchh seenon mein hai
nissandeh unaka rab us din unakee pooree khabar rakhata hoga
vah khadakhadaanevaalee
kya hai vah khadakhadaanevaalee
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki kya hai vah khadakhadaanevaalee
jis din log bikhare hue patangon ke sadrsh ho jaengen
aur pahaad ke dhun ke hue rang-birang ke oon jaise ho jaenge
phir jis kisee ke vazan bhaaree honge
vah manabhaate jeevan mein rahega
aur raha vah vyakti jisake vazan halake honge
usakee maan hogee gahara khadd
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki vah kya hai
aag hai dahakatee huee
tumhen ek-doosare ke muqaabale mein bahutaayat ke pradarshan aur ghamand ne gafî€¼lat mein daal rakha hai
yahaan tak ki tum qabristaanon mein pahunch gae
kuchh nahin, tum sheeghr hee jaan loge
phir, kuchh nahin, tumhen sheeghr hee maaloom ho jaega
kuchh nahin, agar tum vishvasaneey gyaan ke roop mein jaan lo! (to tum dhan-daulat ke pujaaree na bano)
avashy hee tum bhadakatee aag se do-chaar hoge
phir suno, use avashy dekhoge is dasha mein ki vah yathaavat vishvaas hoga
phir nishchay hee us din tumase nematon ke baare mein poochha jaega
gavaah hai guzarata samay
ki vaastav mein manushy ghaate mein hai
sivaay un logon ke jo eemaan lae aur achchhe karm kie aur ek-doosare ko haq kee taakeed kee, aur ek-doosare ko dhairy kee taakeed kee
tabaahee hai har kacho ke lagaanevaale, aib nikaalanevaale ke lie
jo maal ikattha karata aur use ginata raha
samajhata hai ki usake maal ne use amar kar diya
kadaapi nahin, vah choor-choor kar denevaalee mein phenk diya jaega
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki vah choor-choor kar denevaalee kya hai
vah allaah kee dahakaee huee aag hai
jo jhaank letee hai dilon ko
vah unapar dhaankakar band kar dee gaee hogee
lambe-lambe stambhon mein
kya tumane dekha nahin ki tumhaare rab ne haatheevaalon ke saath kaisa barataav kiya
kya usane unakee chaal ko akaarath nahin kar diya
aur unapar niyukt hone ko jhund ke jhund pakshee bheje
unapar kankareele patthar maar rahe the
antatah unhen aisa kar diya, jaise khaane ka bhoosa ho
kitana hai quraish ko lagae aur parachae rakhana
lagae aur parachae rakhana unhen jaade aur garmee kee yaatra se
atah unhen chaahie ki is ghar (kaaba) ke rab kee bandagee kare
jisane unhen khilaakar bhookh se bachaaya aur nishchintata pradaan karake bhay se bachaaya
kya tumane use dekha jo deen ko jhuthalaata hai
vahee to hai jo anaath ko dhakke deta hai
aur muhataaj ke khilaane par nahin ukasaata
atah tabaahee hai un namaaziyon ke lie
jo apanee namaaz se gaaphil (asaavadhaan) hain
jo dikhaave ke lie kaary karate hain
aur saadhaaran baratane kee cheez bhee kisee ko nahin dete
nishchay hee hamane tumhen kausar pradaan kiya
atah tum apane rab hee ke lie namaaz padho aur (usee ke din) qaî€¼urabaanee karo
nissandeh tumhaara jo vairee hai vahee jadakata hai
kah do, "ai inakaar karanevaalo
main vaisee bandagee nahin karoonga jaisee bandagee tum karate ho
aur na tum vaisee bandagee karanevaale ho jaisee bandagee mein karata hoon
aur na main vaisee bandagee karanevaala hoon jaisee bandagee tumane kee hai
aur na tum vaisee bandagee karanevaala hue jaisee bandagee main karata hoon
tumhaare lie toomhaara dharm hai aur mere lie mera dharm
jab allaah kee sahaayata aa jae aur vijay praapt ho
aur tum logon ko dekho ki ve allaah ke deen (dharm) mein giroh ke giroh pravesh kar rahe hai
to apane rab kee prashansa karo aur usase kshama chaaho. nissandeh vah bada tauba qabool karanevaala hai
toot gae aboo lahab ke donon haath aur vah svayan bhee vinasht ho gaya
na usaka maal usake kaam aaya aur na vah kuchh jo usane kamaaya
vah sheeghr hee prajvalit bhadakatee aag mein padega
aur usakee stree bhee eedhan laadanevaalee
usakee garadan mein khajoor ke reson kee batee huee rassee padee hai
kaho, "vah allaah yakata hai
allaah nirapeksh (aur sarvaadhaar) hai
na vah janita hai aur na jany
aur na koee usaka samakaksh hai.
kaho, "main sharan leta hoon, prakat karanevaale rab kee
jo kuchh bhee usane paida kiya usakee buraee se
aur andhere kee buraee se jabaki vah ghus aae
aur gaantho mein phoonk maarane-vaalon kee buraee se
aur eershyaalu kee buraee se, jab vah eershya kare.
kaho, "main sharan leta hoon manushyon ke rab kee
manushyon ke samraat kee
manushyon ke upaasy kee
vasavasa daalanevaale, khisak jaanevaale kee buraee se
jo manushyon ke seenon mein vasavasa daalata hain
jo jinnon mein se bhee hota hain aur manushyon mein se bhee
